title: Average ticket price New York Knicks ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2013/14 to 2009/10.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2015/16 to 2013/14.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2008/09 to 2006/07.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2009/10 to 2008/09.
gold: This graph depicts the average ticket price for New York Knicks games of the National Basketball Association from 2006/07 to 2015/16 . In the 2006/07 season , the average ticket price was 70.51 U.S. dollars . With an average price of more than 120 U.S. dollars , tickets for New York Knicks games are the most expensive in the league .
